name: Hanna Hatfield
description: Hanna is a junior majoring in Mechanical Engineering Technology who joined Purdue IEEE in 2019. In her free time she enjoys gaming with friends and spending time outdoors.

name: David Ho
description: David is a senior majoring in Materials Engineering and has been a part of the ROV team since Fall of 2018. Outside IEEE, he enjoys skateboarding, cooking, and drawing.

name: Joseph Choi
description: Joseph is a senior who is majoring in Mechanical Engineering. He joined IEEE in 2018 as part of EMBS and takes interest in bio-mechanics and 3D modelling. When he has free time he can be found fencing, running, or playing video games.

name: Chris Laszlo
description: Chris is a senior in Mechanical Engineering and has been a part of the ROV team since Spring of 2019. He is a co-op student at Allison Transmission and in his free time he enjoys gaming, biking, Prius, and going to the gym.

name: Varun Gannavarapu
description: Varun is a junior double majoring in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science with a minor in proof-based mathematics. He has been part of the Learning committee since Spring 2021. Outside of IEEE, he enjoys playing guitar, reading, and going to the gym.

name: Kaitlyn Yu
description: Kaitlyn is a sophomore studying Electrical Engineering. She is a part of ROV and Growth & Engagement since 2019. Outside of IEEE, she enjoys cooking, running, and recently bouldering.

name: Ethan Welp
description: Ethan is a junior in Computer Engineering and is part of the ROV team. He has been involved with Learning since 2020 and likes to go running and play piano.

name: Siwen (Alice) Hu
description: Siwen is a junior studying Computer Science and is a member of Learning and Social. She loves reading, watching movies, and playing poker and board games with her friends.

name: Aaradhya Jajoo
description: Aaradhya is a sophomore in Computer Engineering. He is the Industrial Relations chair and is part of the ROV mechanical team. His hobbies include playing badminton and any adventure sport.

name: Matthieu Opdyke
description: Matthieu is a junior in Aerospace Engineering and has been a member of PART since 2019. He loves watching soccer, playing tennis, and supporting Purdue Basketball.

name: Ryan Rask
description: Ryan is a junior majoring in Computer Engineering from Elmhurst, Illinois. He joined Computer Society in Fall 2020. In addition to his interest in computer programming and circuitry, Ryan is also in the trumpet section of the Purdue All American Marching Band and enjoys running and video games.

name: Ryan Donoghue
description: Ryan is a senior in Electrical Engineering from Farmington Hills, Michigan. He is currently the chair of IEEE EMBS. His interests include Music, Computer Aided Design, Video Games, and 3D Printing.

name: Sabrina Chang
description: Sabrina is a Junior studing Computer Engineering and has been a part of MTT-S since 2020. In her free time she enjoys watching movies and painting.

name: Boyu Zhou
description: Boyu is a junior majoring in Computer Engineering. He joined IEEE Racing in September 2020 as part of the Electrical sub-team. He likes playing video games and playing around with computer hardware in his free time.

name: Katherine Sandys
description: Katherine is a junior in Computer Engineering and a member of ROV from 2019. In her free time, she loves to hang out with friends, climbing, and running.

name: Hadi A Ahmed
description: Hadi is a junior studying Computer Engineering. He joined Software Saturdays in 2019, and is excited to help Purdue students practice and learn web development. He is a member of the Archery Club and loves photography and anything outdoors.
committees: Software Saturdays, Aerial Robotics, Computer Society
